verses.kjv: The word of the LORD came again unto me, saying,
verses.web: LORD’s word came again to me, saying,
verses.ct: The LORD spoke to me again and said,

verses.kjv: Son of man, there were two women, the daughters of one mother:
verses.web: “Son of man, there were two women, the daughters of one mother.
verses.ct: "Son of man, there were 2 women, daughters of the same mother.

verses.kjv: And they committed whoredoms in Egypt; they committed whoredoms in their youth: there were their breasts pressed, and there they bruised the teats of their virginity.
verses.web: They played the prostitute in Egypt. They played the prostitute in their youth. Their breasts were fondled there, and their youthful nipples were caressed there.
verses.ct: They became prostitutes in Egypt, selling themselves while they were still young. Their breasts were fondled there, and their virginity was taken in that land.

verses.kjv: And the names of them were Aholah the elder, and Aholibah her sister: and they were mine, and they bare sons and daughters. Thus were their names; Samaria is Aholah, and Jerusalem Aholibah.
verses.web: Their names were Oholah the elder, and Oholibah her sister. They became mine, and they bore sons and daughters. As for their names, Samaria is Oholah, and Jerusalem Oholibah.
verses.ct: The older sister was named Oholah, and the younger was Oholibah. They both became mine, and they gave birth to sons and daughters. Now, Oholah represents Samaria, and Oholibah represents Jerusalem.

verses.kjv: And Aholah played the harlot when she was mine; and she doted on her lovers, on the Assyrians her neighbours,
verses.web: “Oholah played the prostitute when she was mine. She doted on her lovers, on the Assyrians her neighbors,
verses.ct: Oholah prostituted herself even though she belonged to me. She lusted after her lovers — the Assyrians, her neighbors —

verses.kjv: Which were clothed with blue, captains and rulers, all of them desirable young men, horsemen riding upon horses.
verses.web: who were clothed with blue, governors and rulers, all of them desirable young men, horsemen riding on horses.
verses.ct: who dressed in blue uniforms: governors and commanders, all of them handsome young men, cavalry officers mounted on horses.

verses.kjv: Thus she committed her whoredoms with them, with all them that were the chosen men of Assyria, and with all on whom she doted: with all their idols she defiled herself.
verses.web: She gave herself as a prostitute to them, all of them the choicest men of Assyria. She defiled herself with the idols of whoever she lusted after.
verses.ct: She gave herself to all of them — the finest men Assyria had to offer. She was obsessed with them and defiled herself with every one of their idols.

verses.kjv: Neither left she her whoredoms brought from Egypt: for in her youth they lay with her, and they bruised the breasts of her virginity, and poured their whoredom upon her.
verses.web: She hasn’t left her prostitution since leaving Egypt; for in her youth they lay with her. They caressed her youthful nipples; and they poured out their prostitution on her.
verses.ct: She never gave up the prostitution she'd started back in Egypt, where men had slept with her since her youth, taken her virginity, and poured out their lust on her.

verses.kjv: Wherefore I have delivered her into the hand of her lovers, into the hand of the Assyrians, upon whom she doted.
verses.web: “Therefore I delivered her into the hand of her lovers, into the hand of the Assyrians, on whom she doted.
verses.ct: So I handed her over to her lovers, the Assyrians she was so obsessed with.

verses.kjv: These discovered her nakedness: they took her sons and her daughters, and slew her with the sword: and she became famous among women; for they had executed judgment upon her.
verses.web: These uncovered her nakedness. They took her sons and her daughters; and they killed her with the sword. She became a byword among women; for they executed judgments on her.
verses.ct: They stripped her naked, seized her sons and daughters, and killed her with the sword. She became an example among women everywhere — a cautionary tale — because judgment was carried out against her.

verses.kjv: And when her sister Aholibah saw this, she was more corrupt in her inordinate love than she, and in her whoredoms more than her sister in her whoredoms.
verses.web: “Her sister Oholibah saw this, yet she was more corrupt in her lusting than she, and in her prostitution which was more depraved than the prostitution of her sister.
verses.ct: Her sister Oholibah watched all of this happen, yet she became even more depraved in her lust and prostitution than Oholah had ever been.

verses.kjv: She doted upon the Assyrians her neighbours, captains and rulers clothed most gorgeously, horsemen riding upon horses, all of them desirable young men.
verses.web: She lusted after the Assyrians, governors and rulers, her neighbors, clothed most gorgeously, horsemen riding on horses, all of them desirable young men.
verses.ct: She too lusted after the Assyrians — governors and commanders dressed in splendid uniforms, cavalry officers on horseback, all of them handsome young men.

verses.kjv: Then I saw that she was defiled, that they took both one way,
verses.web: I saw that she was defiled. They both went the same way.
verses.ct: I saw that she had defiled herself. Both sisters had gone down the same path.

verses.kjv: And that she increased her whoredoms: for when she saw men pourtrayed upon the wall, the images of the Chaldeans pourtrayed with vermilion,
verses.web: “She increased her prostitution; for she saw men portrayed on the wall, the images of the Chaldeans portrayed with red,
verses.ct: But Oholibah took her prostitution even further. She saw images of men carved on a wall — figures of Babylonian soldiers painted in bright red,

verses.kjv: Girded with girdles upon their loins, exceeding in dyed attire upon their heads, all of them princes to look to, after the manner of the Babylonians of Chaldea, the land of their nativity:
verses.web: dressed with belts on their waists, with flowing turbans on their heads, all of them looking like princes, after the likeness of the Babylonians in Chaldea, the land of their birth.
verses.ct: wearing belts around their waists and flowing turbans on their heads. They all looked like princes, depicted in the style of Babylonians from the land of Chaldea, their homeland.

verses.kjv: And as soon as she saw them with her eyes, she doted upon them, and sent messengers unto them into Chaldea.
verses.web: As soon as she saw them, she lusted after them and sent messengers to them into Chaldea.
verses.ct: The moment she laid eyes on them, she was consumed with desire and sent messengers to them in Chaldea.

verses.kjv: And the Babylonians came to her into the bed of love, and they defiled her with their whoredom, and she was polluted with them, and her mind was alienated from them.
verses.web: The Babylonians came to her into the bed of love, and they defiled her with their prostitution. She was polluted with them, and her soul was alienated from them.
verses.ct: So the Babylonians came to her bed and defiled her with their lust. But after she was polluted by them, she turned against them in disgust.

verses.kjv: So she discovered her whoredoms, and discovered her nakedness: then my mind was alienated from her, like as my mind was alienated from her sister.
verses.web: So she uncovered her prostitution and uncovered her nakedness. Then my soul was alienated from her, just like my soul was alienated from her sister.
verses.ct: When she openly flaunted her prostitution and exposed herself for all to see, I turned away from her in disgust, just as I had turned away from her sister.

verses.kjv: Yet she multiplied her whoredoms, in calling to remembrance the days of her youth, wherein she had played the harlot in the land of Egypt.
verses.web: Yet she multiplied her prostitution, remembering the days of her youth, in which she had played the prostitute in the land of Egypt.
verses.ct: Yet she piled on even more prostitution, longing for the days of her youth when she had sold herself in Egypt.

verses.kjv: For she doted upon their paramours, whose flesh is as the flesh of asses, and whose issue is like the issue of horses.
verses.web: She lusted after their lovers, whose flesh is as the flesh of donkeys, and whose issue is like the issue of horses.
verses.ct: She lusted after lovers whose bodies were like those of donkeys and whose sexual emissions were like those of stallions.

verses.kjv: Thus thou calledst to remembrance the lewdness of thy youth, in bruising thy teats by the Egyptians for the paps of thy youth.
verses.web: Thus you called to memory the lewdness of your youth, in the caressing of your nipples by the Egyptians because of your youthful breasts.
verses.ct: So you relived the depravity of your youth, when the Egyptians fondled your breasts and caressed your young body.

verses.kjv: Therefore, O Aholibah, thus saith the Lord GOD; Behold, I will raise up thy lovers against thee, from whom thy mind is alienated, and I will bring them against thee on every side;
verses.web: “Therefore, Oholibah, the Lord LORD says: ‘Behold, I will raise up your lovers against you, from whom your soul is alienated, and I will bring them against you on every side:
verses.ct: Therefore, Oholibah, this is what the Lord GOD says: I am going to stir up your former lovers against you — the ones you turned away from in disgust — and I will bring them against you from every direction:

verses.kjv: The Babylonians, and all the Chaldeans, Pekod, and Shoa, and Koa, and all the Assyrians with them: all of them desirable young men, captains and rulers, great lords and renowned, all of them riding upon horses.
verses.web: the Babylonians and all the Chaldeans, Pekod, Shoa, Koa, and all the Assyrians with them; all of them desirable young men, governors and rulers, princes and men of renown, all of them riding on horses.
verses.ct: the Babylonians and all the Chaldeans, the people of Pekod, Shoa, and Koa, and all the Assyrians with them — handsome young men, every one of them governors, commanders, princes, and famous warriors, all mounted on horseback.

verses.kjv: And they shall come against thee with chariots, wagons, and wheels, and with an assembly of people, which shall set against thee buckler and shield and helmet round about: and I will set judgment before them, and they shall judge thee according to their judgments.
verses.web: They will come against you with weapons, chariots, and wagons, and with a company of peoples. They will set themselves against you with buckler, shield, and helmet all around. I will commit the judgment to them, and they will judge you according to their judgments.
verses.ct: They will attack you with weapons, chariots, and wagons, leading a massive army. They will surround you with shields, armor, and helmets on every side. I will hand judgment over to them, and they will punish you by their own standards of justice.

verses.kjv: And I will set my jealousy against thee, and they shall deal furiously with thee: they shall take away thy nose and thine ears; and thy remnant shall fall by the sword: they shall take thy sons and thy daughters; and thy residue shall be devoured by the fire.
verses.web: I will set my jealousy against you, and they will deal with you in fury. They will take away your nose and your ears. Your remnant will fall by the sword. They will take your sons and your daughters; and the rest of you will be devoured by the fire.
verses.ct: I will unleash my jealous anger against you, and they will deal with you in fury. They will cut off your nose and your ears. Your survivors will fall by the sword. They will seize your sons and daughters, and whatever is left will be consumed by fire.

verses.kjv: They shall also strip thee out of thy clothes, and take away thy fair jewels.
verses.web: They will also strip you of your clothes, and take away your beautiful jewels.
verses.ct: They will strip the clothes off your back and take away all your beautiful jewelry.

verses.kjv: Thus will I make thy lewdness to cease from thee, and thy whoredom brought from the land of Egypt: so that thou shalt not lift up thine eyes unto them, nor remember Egypt any more.
verses.web: Thus I will make your lewdness to cease from you, and remove your prostitution from the land of Egypt; so that you will not lift up your eyes to them, nor remember Egypt any more.’
verses.ct: This is how I will put an end to your depravity — the prostitution you brought with you from Egypt. You will never again look to Egypt with longing or even think about it anymore.

verses.kjv: For thus saith the Lord GOD; Behold, I will deliver thee into the hand of them whom thou hatest, into the hand of them from whom thy mind is alienated:
verses.web: “For the Lord LORD says: ‘Behold, I will deliver you into the hand of them whom you hate, into the hand of them from whom your soul is alienated.
verses.ct: For this is what the Lord GOD says: I am about to hand you over to the people you hate — the very ones you turned away from in disgust.

verses.kjv: And they shall deal with thee hatefully, and shall take away all thy labour, and shall leave thee naked and bare: and the nakedness of thy whoredoms shall be discovered, both thy lewdness and thy whoredoms.
verses.web: They will deal with you in hatred, and will take away all your labor, and will leave you naked and bare. The nakedness of your prostitution will be uncovered, both your lewdness and your prostitution.
verses.ct: They will treat you with hatred and strip away everything you've worked for, leaving you completely naked and exposed. Your shameful prostitution will be laid bare for all to see — your depravity and your unfaithfulness.

verses.kjv: I will do these things unto thee, because thou hast gone a whoring after the heathen, and because thou art polluted with their idols.
verses.web: These things will be done to you, because you have played the prostitute after the nations, and because you are polluted with their idols.
verses.ct: These things will be done to you because you chased after other nations like a prostitute and made yourself filthy with their idols.

verses.kjv: Thou hast walked in the way of thy sister; therefore will I give her cup into thine hand.
verses.web: You have walked in the way of your sister; therefore I will give her cup into your hand.’
verses.ct: You followed the same path as your sister, so I will put her cup of punishment into your hand.

verses.kjv: Thus saith the Lord GOD; Thou shalt drink of thy sister’s cup deep and large: thou shalt be laughed to scorn and had in derision; it containeth much.
verses.web: “The Lord LORD says: ‘You will drink of your sister’s cup, which is deep and large. You will be ridiculed and held in derision. It contains much.
verses.ct: This is what the Lord GOD says: You will drink from your sister's cup — a cup that is deep and wide. You will become an object of mockery and ridicule, because that cup holds so much.

verses.kjv: Thou shalt be filled with drunkenness and sorrow, with the cup of astonishment and desolation, with the cup of thy sister Samaria.
verses.web: You will be filled with drunkenness and sorrow, with the cup of astonishment and desolation, with the cup of your sister Samaria.
verses.ct: You will be overwhelmed with drunkenness and grief. It is a cup of horror and devastation — the same cup your sister Samaria drank from.

verses.kjv: Thou shalt even drink it and suck it out, and thou shalt break the sherds thereof, and pluck off thine own breasts: for I have spoken it, saith the Lord GOD.
verses.web: You will even drink it and drain it out. You will gnaw the broken pieces of it, and will tear your breasts; for I have spoken it,’ says the Lord LORD.
verses.ct: You will drain it to the last drop, then smash the cup to pieces and claw at your own breasts in anguish. I have spoken, declares the Lord GOD.

verses.kjv: Therefore thus saith the Lord GOD; Because thou hast forgotten me, and cast me behind thy back, therefore bear thou also thy lewdness and thy whoredoms.
verses.web: “Therefore the Lord LORD says: ‘Because you have forgotten me, and cast me behind your back, therefore you also bear your lewdness and your prostitution.’ ”
verses.ct: Therefore, this is what the Lord GOD says: Because you have forgotten me and turned your back on me, you must now bear the full weight of your depravity and prostitution.

verses.kjv: The LORD said moreover unto me; Son of man, wilt thou judge Aholah and Aholibah? yea, declare unto them their abominations;
verses.web: LORD said moreover to me: “Son of man, will you judge Oholah and Oholibah? Then declare to them their abominations.
verses.ct: Then the LORD said to me, "Son of man, are you ready to pass judgment on Oholah and Oholibah? Then confront them with their disgusting sins.

verses.kjv: That they have committed adultery, and blood is in their hands, and with their idols have they committed adultery, and have also caused their sons, whom they bare unto me, to pass for them through the fire, to devour them.
verses.web: For they have committed adultery, and blood is in their hands. They have committed adultery with their idols. They have also caused their sons, whom they bore to me, to pass through the fire to them to be devoured.
verses.ct: They have committed adultery, and their hands are stained with blood. They committed adultery with their idols, and they even sacrificed their own children — the sons they bore to me — burning them in the fire as food for those idols.

verses.kjv: Moreover this they have done unto me: they have defiled my sanctuary in the same day, and have profaned my sabbaths.
verses.web: Moreover this they have done to me: they have defiled my sanctuary in the same day, and have profaned my Sabbaths.
verses.ct: On top of all that, they defiled my sanctuary and violated my Sabbaths — all on the very same day.

verses.kjv: For when they had slain their children to their idols, then they came the same day into my sanctuary to profane it; and, lo, thus have they done in the midst of mine house.
verses.web: For when they had slain their children to their idols, then they came the same day into my sanctuary to profane it; and behold, they have done this in the middle of my house.
verses.ct: On the same day they slaughtered their children for their idols, they walked right into my sanctuary and defiled it. That is what they did inside my own house.

verses.kjv: And furthermore, that ye have sent for men to come from far, unto whom a messenger was sent; and, lo, they came: for whom thou didst wash thyself, paintedst thy eyes, and deckedst thyself with ornaments,
verses.web: “Furthermore you sisters have sent for men who come from far away, to whom a messenger was sent, and behold, they came; for whom you washed yourself, painted your eyes, decorated yourself with ornaments,
verses.ct: They even sent messengers to invite men from far away. When those men arrived, the sisters bathed themselves, painted their eyes, and put on jewelry to look beautiful for them.

verses.kjv: And satest upon a stately bed, and a table prepared before it, whereupon thou hast set mine incense and mine oil.
verses.web: and sat on a stately bed, with a table prepared before it, whereupon you set my incense and my oil.
verses.ct: They sat on an elegant couch with a table spread before it, and on that table they placed my incense and my oil.

verses.kjv: And a voice of a multitude being at ease was with her: and with the men of the common sort were brought Sabeans from the wilderness, which put bracelets upon their hands, and beautiful crowns upon their heads.
verses.web: “The voice of a multitude being at ease was with her. With men of the common sort were brought drunkards from the wilderness; and they put bracelets on their hands, and beautiful crowns on their heads.
verses.ct: The sound of a carefree crowd filled the room. Along with common men, drunkards were brought in from the wilderness. They put bracelets on the women's wrists and beautiful crowns on their heads.

verses.kjv: Then said I unto her that was old in adulteries, Will they now commit whoredoms with her, and she with them?
verses.web: Then I said of her who was old in adulteries, ‘Now they will play the prostitute with her, and she with them.’
verses.ct: Then I said about the one worn out by adultery, 'Now they will use her as a prostitute, and she will use them.'

verses.kjv: Yet they went in unto her, as they go in unto a woman that playeth the harlot: so went they in unto Aholah and unto Aholibah, the lewd women.
verses.web: They went in to her, as they go in to a prostitute. So they went in to Oholah and to Oholibah, the lewd women.
verses.ct: And that's exactly what happened. Men went to them the way they go to a prostitute. That is how they went to Oholah and Oholibah, those depraved women.

verses.kjv: And the righteous men, they shall judge them after the manner of adulteresses, and after the manner of women that shed blood; because they are adulteresses, and blood is in their hands.
verses.web: Righteous men will judge them with the judgment of adulteresses and with the judgment of women who shed blood; because they are adulteresses, and blood is in their hands.
verses.ct: But righteous people will judge them with the sentence reserved for adulteresses and murderers, because that is exactly what they are — adulteresses with blood on their hands.

verses.kjv: For thus saith the Lord GOD; I will bring up a company upon them, and will give them to be removed and spoiled.
verses.web: “For the Lord LORD says: ‘I will bring up a mob against them, and will give them to be tossed back and forth and robbed.
verses.ct: This is what the Lord GOD says: I will bring a mob against them and hand them over to be terrorized and plundered.

verses.kjv: And the company shall stone them with stones, and dispatch them with their swords; they shall slay their sons and their daughters, and burn up their houses with fire.
verses.web: The company will stone them with stones, and dispatch them with their swords. They will kill their sons and their daughters, and burn up their houses with fire.
verses.ct: That mob will stone them and cut them down with swords. They will kill their sons and daughters and burn their houses to the ground.

verses.kjv: Thus will I cause lewdness to cease out of the land, that all women may be taught not to do after your lewdness.
verses.web: “ ‘Thus I will cause lewdness to cease out of the land, that all women may be taught not to be lewd like you.
verses.ct: This is how I will put an end to depravity in the land, so that every woman will be warned not to follow their example.

verses.kjv: And they shall recompense your lewdness upon you, and ye shall bear the sins of your idols: and ye shall know that I am the Lord GOD.
verses.web: They will recompense your lewdness on you, and you will bear the sins of your idols. Then you will know that I am the Lord LORD.’ ”
verses.ct: Your depravity will be turned back on you, and you will bear the consequences of your idol worship. Then you will know that I am the Lord GOD."
